timeline.bodyText: Maybe you could make this condition more readable if you outsource it to a function, e.g. isGlobalVariable(UserData<?> item)
timeline.author: mstoeg

timeline.bodyText: Is it really necessary to add the userVariable in each testcase? I would prefer to add it in the setUp() method by simply calling project.addUserList(userList) and project.addUserVariable(userVariable) once. Same applies for all the other Tests.
timeline.author: mstoeg

replies.bodyText: Definitely should have done it that way, thanks.
replies.author: Rawbat

timeline.bodyText:
Please just return the condition here: return currentProject.getUserVariables().contains(item) || ...
And I would not place this method in the Utils class but rather in the Project class as an instance method.
